definitions.definition: Something opposite or contrary to something else.
A person or thing that is entirely different from or the reverse of someone or something else; used to show contrast between two people or two things.
examples: She is the opposite of her ex-boyfriend who abused her both physically and verbally nearly every day for five years. She now works as an advocate and supportive listener for others who have endured abusive relationships.

main_definition: Something opposite or contrary to something else.
secondary_definitions: A person or thing that is entirely different from or the reverse of someone or something else; used to show contrast between two people or two things.
